comments.body: Explain what could be the consequence of discarding them? In what cases would the user need to change this setting?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +55,59 @@    fail-stream-on-ack-timeout = false
    # How long the stage should preserve connection status events for the first subscriber before discarding them
    connection-status-subscription-timeout = 5 seconds
  }
  #consumer
